definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="33" y="27"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="block_energy_receive"><value name="amount"><block type="math_from_text"><value name="NUMTEXT"><block type="get_command_parameters"><field name="paramid">0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="x"><block type="entity_lookpos_x"><field name="fluid_mode">NONE</field><field name="block_mode">OUTLINE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="entity_lookpos_y"><field name="fluid_mode">NONE</field><field name="block_mode">OUTLINE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_lookpos_z"><field name="fluid_mode">NONE</field><field name="block_mode">OUTLINE</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="direction"><block type="direction_unspecified"></block></value><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">This block's energy is now </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="block_energy_get"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="direction"><block type="direction_unspecified"></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
